worldofzuul

Class Items

  • java.lang.Object
    • worldofzuul.Items

  • public class Items
extends java.lang.Object
    The class Items is based on that there is several different items that the player can get. These Items must be delivered from one NPC to another through a receiver id (RID). Each item has a unique id and description & the item has a weight. There is a limit of how much weight and how many items the player can have. The paperwork on each item can have an effect of the difficulty to deliver the pakage.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Items

        public Items(int weight,
             int reputationWorth,
             java.lang.String desciption,
             int rid,
             int pid)
        The constructor
        Parameters:
        weight - of the item, used to limit how many items can be carried
        reputationWorth - decides how much this item is worth in reputation
        desciption - of the item
        rid - identifies which NPC has to recieve the item at the start of the game
        pid - identifies where the item should "spawn" at the start of the game
